mapper.select: select *, (select count(*) from adminReply where reportNo = r.reportNo) as replyCount from reportBoard r where r.reporter = #{reporter} order by r.reportNo desc

select * from reportBoard where reporter = #{reporter} and
reason like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
postNo like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
order by reportNo DESC

select count(*) from reportBoard where reporter = #{reporter} and
reason like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
postNo like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')

select f.postNo, f.title, f.content, f.writer, f.regDate, f.viewCount, f.sameThinking, f.boardNo, f.imageFileName, (select count(*) from reply where postNo = f.postNo) as replyCount, b.boardName from freeBoard f, members m, boardInCategory b where f.writer = m.nick and f.boardNo = b.boardNo and m.memberNo = #{memberNo} order by f.postNo desc

select f.postNo, f.title, f.writer, DATE_FORMAT(f.regDate,'%Y-%m-%d') as regDate, f.viewCount, f.sameThinking, f.boardNo, b.boardName from freeBoard f, boardInCategory b where f.boardNo = b.boardNo and f.writer = #{writer} and
f.title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
f.content like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
(f.title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR f.content like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%'))
order by f.postNo DESC

select count(*) from freeBoard f, boardInCategory b where f.boardNo = b.boardNo and f.writer = #{writer} and
f.title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
f.content like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
(f.title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR f.content like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%'))
